name: Uber Shape
description:
As a square, life always seemed so simple. You had a place to be, a function, and you were content with what you were. Then one day, something changed, and you discovered you could become so much more…

In Uber Shape, you not only race to survive, you race to change. Race across a beautiful procedurally generated cityscape as you rack up your distance and avoid those dangerous platform sides. Use identical shapes to slow yourself down, or use different shapes to speed up and gain more distance quicker. Whatever your play style, Uber Shape promises to deliver intense and challenging gameplay time and time again.

Features:

- Intuitive yet challenging endless runner gameplay
- Totally procedural world (including graphics)
- Fully dynamic day-night cycle
- Shop to spend all those hard-earned coins in
- Automatic iCloud syncing
- Game Center leaderboards
- Universal purchase for iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and the new Apple TV
- No Ads or In-App Purchases. Ever.

Will you become the Uber Shape?
